actionItems.text: Sucre to tweak the scripts and relay the imagery for the onboarding video to LilyCupcake
Sucre to share our Commissioning Video clips Google doc
Sucre to meet Workgroup leads and discuss when we can visit their meetings to discuss onboarding.
Vani and Onyeka to make changes to the survey form as discussed in the meeting.
Sucre to create a sign-up sheet for visits to other WGs to discuss onboarding
Lady Tempestt to make necessary corrections to the Twitter thread Doc.
Sucre to send the Twitter thread Doc to Mikasa in the writers workgroup once it's finished

Sucre to add an FAQ on 'How do I get rewarded?'
Onyeka to add an FAQ on 'What wallet is to be used'
Vani to make a post on the Ambassador general channel about new members joining the Gamer's Guild.
Onyeka to create visuals for the Twitter thread doc
Sucre to make the agreed changes to Dework Introductions task.

decisionItems.decision: We agreed to set a deadline (1st of December) for the Onboarding Survey Form.
Onboarding WG has agreed to test the new archives documentation tool for meeting minutes.
We agreed that our estimate of 15 mins for the completion of the survey form is about right.
We agreed to launch the survey form on the 21st of November 2023 in the Town Hall meeting, after checking it in our next meeting
We have decided to add some visuals to our Twitter thread about onboarding process.
We agreed on rewarding 10 AGIX and 50 GMBLs for completion of the Introductory task.

discussionPoints: Changes to the Onboarding survey form
Twitter thread on the Getting started doc

tags.topicsCovered: Onboarding survey, Collaboration, Town Hall update, Rewards, Getting Started twitter thread, New Onboarding video

meetingInfo.peoplePresent: Vanessa, SucrenSpice, Peter, lord kizzy, Clement Umoh, LadyTempestt, daniel effiom, Yemi Solves, Duke, MartinSoki, Ayo, Cjfrankie, Gorga Siagian, Merryman, Eric Davies, AdavanceAmeyaw, Colleen, Kateri, Onize
meetingInfo.purpose: Weekly meeting featuring discussions on August projections, and how to onboard people to the Ambassador program.

workingDocs.title: Onboarding Journey Script by Rejoice -- Sample 1

agendaItems.townHallUpdates: 1. Clement and Gorga Siagian gave an update on the last community town hall; they talked about the skills matrix where members of the group made inputs on the skills they already have and would also want to learn.   2. As a follow up to the skills matrix, they talked about the documentation session scheduled for 15th of August where Lady Tempest will anchor a training session. This session will be based on the skills decided upon by the workgroup based on the output of the skills matrix.  3. Additionally, they talked about the new set of onboarders who are tasked with the responsibility of onboarding new people into the group and program in general.
issues: 'Onboarding Journeys' scripts - the next meeting will feature a discussion on the Onboarding Journeys script alongside the comments and thoughts from the WG members.

actionItems.text: Gorga Siagian to chase Cjfrankie to decide on a date for the discussion of his allegations against the workgroup.
Cj Frankie to add the meeting summary note for July the 4th to the meeting summary tool.
Sucre to edit the facilitation and documentation document to fit the summer holidays.
Colleen to decide on a suitable date for the 'GitHub project management' training in September.

Following a discussion with the 'training in September,' Vani to share a post in the channel about what other skills people would like to learn because most are talking about decentralized governance.

decisionItems.decision: After many comments from the WG members, we agreed that the meeting facilitators should meet with their mentees before the meeting to know the sections each of them will take. The same goes for documentation: the main documenter and the mentee will take the meeting notes and compare them after the meeting to spot some mistakes and possible ways to improve on their next try.
decisionItems.rationale: From the facilitation side of things, we seek to have a well-organized change of hands between the facilitator and the mentee. The same goes for meeting facilitation; we seek to groom the mentee by allowing them to take notes as well to help them do better on their next try.

decisionItems.decision: In view of the recent events, the facilitation and documentation roster will be edited to fit the forthcoming summer holidays.
We decided that Timmy should attend two consecutive meetings preceding his meeting documentation scheduled for 26th Sept 2024; otherwise, someone else will be assigned to it.
decisionItems.rationale: Timmy has been away for a while now, so he has to attend two meetings to prove he is still interested!

decisionItems.decision: We have assigned different people to ask other workgroups/guilds, namely: LatAm guild, AI Ethics, African guild, Marketing guild, Writer's WG, and Strategy guild, about the skills new members should have and can learn in their WG, so we decided that these people will work on this project throughout August and then bring the results on 5th September 2024.

Speaking of the onboarding journeys, we have decided that the open governance call will be the best place to discuss these journeys, and each member of the WG should read and comment before the next meeting scheduled for 8th September 2024. On that day, we shall also discuss What we should do with the journey script (video or infographics?), how to work with it moving forward, and how to use it in a meeting.
decisionItems.rationale: There's still a lot of things to be cleared out.

decisionItems.decision: We agreed to meet on the 1st and 8th of August and then have Lady Tempestt host a documentation session on the 15th whilst taking the 22nd and 29th of August off.

discussionPoints: Agreeing to the minutes of the last meeting.
Action items from the last meeting.

tags.topicsCovered: Town hall updates , onboarding journeys, GitHub project management training, skillshare matrix, Decentralization,  open governance, meeting facilitation, Documentation
